interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Guest of Honor " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Value of Sharing " .

progression.synopsis: Wandering around the city, Sensei meets Rin and Futaba at a bistro. They have been working on Halloween costumes, and ask if Sensei is also planning to dress up â€” he says no. As usual, Kaori turns out to be the waitress, and Rin and Futaba are surprised to learn that Sensei went on a "date" with her. Kaori mentions that their relationship involves her handling his "meat", but the resulting misunderstanding is eventually cleared up. Sensei hits on the idea of asking Kaori to tend the bar at the Halloween drinks Sara mentioned . Kaori agrees, but wants Sensei to go for a walk with her when she gets off work.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p1.
